function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extraction of knowledge from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the constructed KG.","Impact":"Misinformation in the KG can lead to incorrect conclusions and decisions in the field of virus research and disease management.","Mitigation":"Implement data validation processes and cross-reference information from multiple sources to ensure accuracy and consistency.","Technologies":"Data validation tools, cross-referencing algorithms, and knowledge graph validation frameworks.","People":"Researchers, data scientists, and knowledge engineers working on the construction of the KG.","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, and data governance teams."}]}
